title: Headhunter Nidalee invisible spears.
body: Riot please. Can't see my death coming. All I see is the light vortex of the front of a spear coming at me.

replies.body: Yeah, only bads use that skin.

> [{quoted}](name=Bipolar,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=WHdVuE0J,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-05-16T10:10:12.125+0000)
>
> Yeah, only bads use that skin.

Not sure about that, as Darkreaver said it is a problem occurring across the board with nidalee

The problem is that at times her spears seem to sink through the terrain, using the skin and jungling means you can gank mid from river and throw the invisible spear, it really should be fixed though, but this has been known for ages and never fixed.
This is also happening with the regular Nidalee skin.
